description: A complete Fundamental learning roadmap from absolute beginner to professional level, designed for school students, college learners, interview preparation, and real-world Java developers. Covers Java fundamentals, OOP, inheritance, abstract classes, interfaces, threads, collections, and JVM concepts.

teacher.bio: This roadmap focuses on deep Java fundamentals, object-oriented thinking, and interview-ready concepts with real-world clarity.
